document.full_text: shares of foxconn international holdings  the world's top contract cellphone maker, slipped to a two-year low after reporting another interim loss, with analysts cautioning that rising costs and a lack of clear strategy would hamper the company further.
document.title: foxconn int'l shares slump after posting another loss
lines_and_colors: shares of foxconn international holdings  the world's top contract cellphone maker, slipped to a two-year low after reporting another interim loss, with analysts cautioning that rising costs and a lack of clear strategy would hamper the company further.
